alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 615 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mission Bay, or 8 miles west of Boca Raton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Delray Beach, Mission Bay, Whisper Walk, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Kings Point, Loxahatchee NWR, Morikami Park, Boca West, Villages Of Oriole, South County Regional Park and Boca Raton Equestrian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
